price: Ele lhes faz promessas e fá-los nutrir vãs esperanças. E Satã não lhes promete senão falácias.
arabic: يَعِدُهُمۡ وَيُمَنِّيهِمۡۖ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yaʿiduhum wayumannīhim wamā yaʿiduhumu al-shayṭānu illā ghurūran
